snippet: CleanEdge, BrightSource, SolarReserve: do energy companies distrust spaces between words?
abstract: CleanEdge, BrightSource, SolarReserve: do energy companies distrust spaces between words?
lead_paragraph: As readers may have noticed, I wrote here this week about CleanEdge Power, FlexEnergy, SolarReserve and BrightSource. Is there a corporate branding consultant somewhere who specializes in energy companies and doesntlikespaces?

headline.main: Maybe It Fits Better in a Tweet?
